about_the_game:
IDUN is named after the Norse goddess of youth, and our story begins as humanity lands on a planet named after her. Welcome to IDUN, a new breed of defense RTS where explosive single-player action meets a gripping story campaign. Hold the line against massive swarms on a fully simulated battlefield, where your objective is to extract resources from a hostile planet before being overrun by enemy hordes.

This is a real-time strategy and tower defense game where you can move turrets at will. The goal is to extract sufficient resources from the planet before being overwhelmed by enemy forces.



Embark on an adventure with the eclectic crew stationed on this outer rim drilling station, where a captivating tale of love, deception, and death awaits. Some members can even be deployed on the battlefield as Heroes.

Key Features:
  • Overwhelming swarms of enemies filling the screen
  • A blend of RTS and tower defense mechanics with real-time troop management
  • Fully destructible terrain and smooth pathfinding AI for more complex and varied enemy attack patterns
  • Diverse combat units with coordinated land and air operations


Research and upgrade your arsenal over the course of the game, specializing and adapting to overcome increasingly difficult challenges. Every mission presents unique obstacles, from new enemies and environmental anomalies to game-changing modifiers.


Play the game how you like. The game supports Mouse & Keyboard, Gamepad & Touch!
Extensive customization options for visuals and controls.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64-bit or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10310U or AMD Ryzen 7 3700U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620 or AMD Radeon Vega 3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 64-bit or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
